title: NC Lawmakers Divided Over Iran Strikes
summary: NC Republicans support US-Israel strikes on Iran, while Democrats deem them unconstitutional and demand a congressional vote.
charlotte_impact: Highlights deep political divisions within North Carolina regarding foreign policy and military actions.

title: Warmer Weather Arrives for Meteorological Spring
summary: Patchy fog in the morning will give way to sunshine and 70-degree temperatures in the afternoon.
charlotte_impact: Marks the beginning of meteorological spring with a forecast of pleasant weather conditions.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Pickup Truck in Gastonia
summary: A sinkhole near Airline and Brown streets in Gastonia swallowed an unattended pickup truck overnight; no injuries were reported.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates infrastructure challenges and potential hazards in the Gastonia area.

title: Charlotte Protests Against Iran Strikes
summary: A protest against the U.S.-Israeli military strikes on Iran is scheduled for 4 p.m. at Romare Bearden Park.
charlotte_impact: Reflects public opposition to military actions and foreign policy decisions.

title: Huntersville Plans to Address Congested Corridor
summary: Huntersville is planning to address traffic congestion on NC-115, a major artery experiencing standstill traffic during rush hour.
charlotte_impact: Addresses ongoing traffic issues and infrastructure planning in the Huntersville area.

title: Early Voting Ends for NC Primary Elections
summary: Early voting for North Carolina's primary elections ends Saturday at 3 p.m., giving residents a final chance to vote early.
charlotte_impact: Provides a reminder about the conclusion of early voting in the pivotal primary elections.

title: Overnight Shooting in East Charlotte
summary: An overnight shooting in the 6500 block of E W.T. Harris Boulevard in east Charlotte leaves one person critically injured.
charlotte_impact: Reports a serious violent crime incident in east Charlotte, raising public safety concerns.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte
summary: The I-485 Express Lanes in south Charlotte are now open, offering drivers a faster option between I-77 and U.S. 74.
charlotte_impact: Introduces a new transportation option aimed at alleviating traffic congestion in south Charlotte.

title: Woman Dies After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman dies weeks after being assaulted in east Charlotte. The suspect is in custody as of Feb. 27, 2026.
charlotte_impact: Reports a tragic outcome of a violent assault, highlighting crime and safety issues.

title: Mother and Boyfriend Accused of Assaulting Child
summary: A mother and her boyfriend are accused of assaulting a 1-year-old in Burke County, causing a fractured arm.
charlotte_impact: Details a severe case of child abuse, raising concerns about domestic violence.

title: CMPD Targets Crime Hotspots with 'Queen City Safe' Patrols
summary: CMPD is targeting crime hotspots in South Charlotte with 'Queen City Safe' patrols as part of a rebranded safety initiative.
charlotte_impact: Outlines police efforts to address crime in specific areas of Charlotte.

title: Man Sentenced for Sexually Abusing a Girl
summary: A Union County man, Maurice Limon Stitt, 42, was sentenced to a lengthy prison term for sexually abusing a girl.
charlotte_impact: Reports a serious case of sexual abuse and the resulting legal consequences.

title: Driver Kills Another in High-Speed Crash
summary: Joel Laron Smith, 21, is charged with reckless homicide after a high-speed crash exiting I-77 in Rock Hill.
charlotte_impact: Details a fatal traffic accident and the charges against the responsible driver.

title: Man Arrested for Shooting Uncle in Stanley
summary: A man was arrested for shooting his uncle outside a Dollar General on East Dallas Road in Stanley.
charlotte_impact: Reports a shooting incident involving family members in Stanley.

title: Waymo Self-Driving Cars Coming to Charlotte
summary: Waymo confirms its self-driving cars are coming to Charlotte, enabled by a 2017 NC law.
charlotte_impact: Announces the expansion of autonomous vehicle technology to Charlotte.
